price: 104. Moominiiney Siinik hortay khayri fanah Sinam Sectaah maqaaneh Sinam Amrissaah umaanek Sinam waassa Siinit Tanay, woo mari usun jannatti niqmatal yoffoofe mara kinni.
arabic: وَلۡتَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أُمَّةٞ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waltakun minkum ummatun yadʿūna ilā al-khayri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
